title: Advanced Practitioner Training Course for Improving Error-Based Team Learning (TBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A blended learning program aimed at enhancing individual and team-level problem-solving skills for in-service professionals, integrating online-offline activities in a bring-your-own-device (BYOD) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can improve their scientific problem-solving skills by over 20% through error identification and correction processes in team-based activities.
Learners can increase inter-team interaction by over 15% in TBL (Team-Based Learning) with error-insertion strategies applied.
Learners evaluate learning satisfaction at 4.0 or higher on a 5-point scale based on error analysis feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
